pr_title: Fix saml endpoints for tenant-qualified mode

timeline.message:
fix saml endpoints for tenant-qualified mode
revert samlAuthnRequestsSigningEnabled url
add default endpoint constants

timeline.bodyText: Should this be throwing a runtime exception ? Can use IdentityProviderManagementException right
timeline.author: malithie

timeline.bodyText: I don't this we would need to handle this exception one by one.
timeline.author: malithie

timeline.bodyText: were these not read from the file before
timeline.author: malithie

replies.bodyText:
I reverted the previous changes [1]. There, samlLogoutUrl and samlSSOUrl had been using the IdentityConstants.
[1] - https://github.com/wso2/carbon-identity-framework/pull/2828/files#diff-98664c0777759c45d183f9180c27614e
replies.author: chamathns

timeline.bodyText: A wrong config ? Is there a use of this really
timeline.author: malithie

replies.bodyText:
I changed this to its original implementation since I had changed it to use the modified getServerURL method. Shall we remove this since it is not used?
The property is used here [1]. But it is not set to the FederatedAuthnConfig from the IdentityProviderManager impl.
[1] - https://github.com/wso2-extensions/identity-metadata-saml2/blob/41cc848d17f32d5fc377557de91f6efe7473ecb2/components/org.wso2.carbon.identity.idp.metadata.saml2/src/main/java/org/wso2/carbon/identity/idp/metadata/saml2/builder/IDPMetadataBuilder.java#L57
replies.author: chamathns

timeline.author: malithie

replies.bodyText: this is a done for a different method.
replies.author: chamathns

replies.bodyText:
ok
So all these paths just send the path and construct from old way looks to me we can have a method that will just take the context and URL for the legacy mode and return
So handling the exception does not needs to be duplicated, checking tenant qualified does not needs to be duplicated and readability can be improved
replies.author: malithie

replies.bodyText: Introduced a method to handle this.
replies.author: chamathns

replies.bodyText:
This logic should not ideally be here. Rather if this is something that should not be persisted it should be fixed at that place rather than overriding again after reading properties from DB.
Yet, in the context of present scope fixing this path is fine.
replies.author: malithie

timeline.author: malithie

timeline.bodyText:
When giving a path should we really give '/', doesn't the builder handles it.
Even if we give it should handle IMO
timeline.author: malithie

replies.bodyText: No we don't need to give "/". Builder can handle it.
replies.author: chamathns

timeline.bodyText: haven't we read sso url from file
timeline.author: malithie

timeline.message: introduce method to resolve absolute Url

timeline.bodyText: why we send a tenant parameter here. What's the URL that gets constructed
timeline.author: malithie

replies.bodyText: This was the earlier implementation. Before we used the modified getServerURL method
replies.author: chamathns

replies.bodyText: with the new method, we take the constructed url mentioned above, checks if tenantQualifiedURLs is enabled, and if yes, resets it to https://localhost:9443/t/wso2.com/samlsso
replies.author: chamathns

replies.bodyText: I see, so this has been something existed. +1
replies.author: malithie

timeline.bodyText: So which invokes this method and why that tenant param does not need to be applied here
timeline.author: malithie

replies.bodyText:
getResidentIdP invokes this overrideResidentIdpEPUrls(IdentityProvider residentIDP).
So, eventually, FederationAuthenticationConfig properties for samlsso are overwritten through this.
If the query parameter is needed to be appended to the residentIdP configs for samlsso, we need to append that here.
replies.author: chamathns

timeline.bodyText:
Should we add the tenant domain as a query param when the url is read from file?
@malithie @mefarazath @inthirakumaaran
timeline.author: chamathns

replies.bodyText: we should first read from the file. Then if it's empty we construct then only tenant query param should be appended
replies.author: malithie

timeline.message: change samlSSOUrl to read the url from file in legacy mode
change samlSSOUrl to read the url from file in legacy mode
change samlSSOUrl to read the url from file in legacy mode
